dirpath.description: Directory to save the model file. Default: ``None``.
dirpath.title: Dirpath

filename.description: Checkpoint filename. Can contain named formatting options. Default: ``None``.
filename.title: Filename

save_last.description: When True or "link", saves a 'last.ckpt' checkpoint when a checkpoint is saved. Default: ``None``.
save_last.title: Save Last

save_top_k.description: If save_top_k=k, save k models with best monitored quantity. Default: ``1``.
save_top_k.title: Save Top K

save_weights_only.description: If True, only save model weights. Default: ``False``.
save_weights_only.title: Save Weights Only

mode.description: One of {'min', 'max'}. For 'min' training stops when monitored quantity stops decreasing. Default: ``'min'``.
mode.title: Mode

auto_insert_metric_name.description: Whether to automatically insert metric name in checkpoint filename. Default: ``True``.
auto_insert_metric_name.title: Auto Insert Metric Name

every_n_train_steps.description: Number of training steps between checkpoints. Default: ``None``.
every_n_train_steps.title: Every N Train Steps

train_time_interval.description: Checkpoints are monitored at the specified time interval. Default: ``None``.
train_time_interval.title: Train Time Interval

every_n_epochs.description: Number of epochs between checkpoints. Default: ``None``.
every_n_epochs.title: Every N Epochs

save_on_train_epoch_end.description: Whether to run checkpointing at end of training epoch. Default: ``None``.
save_on_train_epoch_end.title: Save On Train Epoch End

enable_version_counter.description: Whether to append version to existing filenames. Default: ``True``.
enable_version_counter.title: Enable Version Counter
